definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

sentences.english: The poop problem has become unmanageable and this could be the answer.
sentences.chinese: 鸟粪问题已经无法控制，这种药将能解决此问题。

sentences.english: Most of these were acquired under the delightfully Guano Island Act. when the U.
sentences.chinese: 大多数岛屿都是由于“鸟粪岛法案”而获得的。

sentences.english: The canyon walls are lined with giant harpy nests and guano.
sentences.chinese: 峡谷壁上到处是巨大的鸟身人巢穴和鸟粪。

sentences.english: Guano means droppings from seabirds used as a sort of fertilizer .
sentences.chinese: 鸟粪层就是海鸟的粪便，可以用作肥料。

sentences.english: Phosphorus can be removed by struvite formation.
sentences.chinese: 利用鸟粪石沉淀法可以去除污水中的磷。

sentences.english: Coveted as fertilizer, the dung must be reaped by hand.
sentences.chinese: 作为肥料备受青睐的鸟粪需人工收获。

sentences.english: Guano is used to make some of the world's finest organic fertiliser .
sentences.chinese: 鸟粪被用来作为世界上最好的有机肥料。

sentences.english: There is no guano comparable in fertility with the detritus of a capital.
sentences.chinese: 任何鸟粪都没有首都的垃圾肥效高。
